name: Stewed Rhubarb With Ginger And Vanilla
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dessert, ginger root, rhubarb, vanilla bean
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped, peeled fresh ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rhubarb, brown sugar, water, ginger and the vanilla bean in a heavy saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, lower the heat and simmer until the rhubarb has nearly dissolved into a puree, about 35 minutes.
Remove the vanilla bean. Use a paring knife to scrape the vanilla seeds from the pod into the rhubarb.
Serve the rhubarb warm or cold as a sauce for ice cream or cake, topped with whipped cream or with stiffly whipped cream folded into it.
